knimeNode.name: Constant Value Column Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: The Constant Value Column Filter filters columns containing only duplicates of the same value.

fullDescription.intro: This node filters columns containing only duplicates of the same value from the input data table. Examples include a column containing only zeroes, a column containing only identical Strings, or a column comprising only empty / missing cells. In a dialog window, the user can specify whether to filter only columns with a specific constant numeric value or String, columns containing only missing values, or all constant columns. In addition, the user can choose which columns to consider for filtering. Columns excluded in this dialog are passed even if they contain only identical values.
fullDescription.option: Select this option to filter all constant value columns independent of the value they contain in duplicates.

option.name: Filter constant value columns with numeric value

fullDescription.option: Select this option to filter columns containing only a specific numeric value.

option.name: Filter constant value columns with String value

fullDescription.option: Select this option to filter columns containing only a specific String value.

option.name: Filter constant value columns with missing value

fullDescription.option: Select this option to filter columns containing only empty cells / missing values.
This list contains the column names of the input table that are to be considered for filtering.

Select this option to enforce the current inclusion list to stay the same even if the input table specification changes. If some of the included columns are not available anymore, a warning is displayed. (New columns will automatically be added to the exclusion list.)
This list contains the column names of the input table that are passed to the output without undergoing filtering.

Select this option to enforce the current exclusion list to stay the same even if the input table specification changes. If some of the excluded columns are not available anymore, a warning is displayed. (New columns will automatically be added to the inclusion list.)

ports.inPort: Table from which columns are to be filtered.
